title: In the footsteps of a naturalist*
introTextList: Together with Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum and Musee*, start your journey and immerse in an interactive learning experience.
Step into the past, and follow In the Footsteps of a Naturalist* to explore Singapore, its rainforests, and rich biodiversity in the 1800s.
Find all four checkpoints in the Heritage Gallery and unlock activities that will challenge you to think, act, and feel like a naturalist.
